review: We got our Fire TV Stick in early December and have been using it since then. So far, I like it a lot. We use it mostly for Netflix and Amazon Prime Videos, but I also love that I can show off pictures and videos from my phone or tablet easily by using the Amazon Cloud Photo app. That feature makes it nice to show pictures and videos to family when they come over and want to see pictures from our kids' recent activities. I also love that there is a remote app available for when the little remote gets misplaced or when I just don't want to carry it around. I can stop what I'm doing and change a show for my kids just using my phone...love that. The only thing I don't like is that it does freeze up from time to time, but it doesn't happen often enough to make me put it at 4 stars instead of 5. Also, it's worth noting that we only use this about 3 evenings a week. If we used it more, it might have more freezing problems or might be more annoying.
